name: A Song of Odyssey (DAYDEV)
description:
A long time ago in the Mid-world, there were two big powers in the mid-world. Called The Light Clan and Dark Clan. 

Lord Tossa, the emperor of the Dark clan, gathered his throng of Soldiers, and declared war against the Light Clan.

Powers clashed and the sky was dyed blood red. Prince Sanpha journey to self  a  war of mid-world.

This project is In-Development Process (Demo Version).
